summary: This Mod will be changed Miraak's appearance and sex.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b][color=#f9cb9c]This Mod will be changed [color=#ff7700]Miraak[/color]'s appearance and sex,[size=4][b] currently only [color=#ff7700]UNP version[/color].[/b][/size]
Body models are standalone, only require the Vanilla Skyrim and Dragonborn DLC.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/70364-4-1464087458.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff7700][color=#f9cb9c]Yes, of course she have a female voice and all the changes are [/color]all of main quest in the DLC~!!![/color]
Sorry about I'm too lazy to write the fomod installer package~[/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f9cb9c]
[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f9cb9c]
[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75870?][color=#c27ba0][size=4][b]Click me to browse the Miraak Follower Compatibility Patch V0.1[/b][/size][/color][/url][color=#f9cb9c][b]
[/b]
[color=#e06666][size=4][b]Thanks to all the authors for sharing MOD[/b][/size][/color][color=#e06666][b][size=4]~！[/size][/b][/color]

[/color][size=3][b][color=#f9cb9c][size=4]-Credits[/size][/color][/b][/size][color=#f9cb9c][size=4][b]-[/b][/size][/color][size=3][b]
